post.body: Just checked out more of your store. Probably the coolest thing I have seen all year! I adore all things trilobite.
Pretty good, thanks so much for asking! And thanks for the compliment too!
Very cool! I really enjoyed that movie. Ever see the documentary? It made me cry!
I liked it too! Much better than I thought it would be.
Thanks! I'll let everyone know when I get back - I've been looking forward to this one!
I just got a new singer for Christmas! I don't know what I'm doing yet either but I'm enjoying it!
I'm in L.A. - just raining here so far, but I haven't attempted to go N. We tried to go E but got turned back at Tuscon :(
Ooo, fun!
Merry Christmas! By the way, all my co-workers loved their soap!
I might even go so far as to say "juvenalia"!
What do you do, if you don't mind my asking?
Me too!! I can't wait!
Drive safe! It is rough out there!
Yuck, work tomorrow? I narrowly dodged that myself. I kind of like frozen mac and cheese though ;)
Merry Christmas to you! Cheers!
Couldn't resist listing one more pair of lucky cat earrings tonight: http://tinyurl.com/83vsl5
Actually had time to list one more thing today: http://tinyurl.com/8d576p
Just saw Frost/Nixon. It was packed! Good film!
Finally put up a new listing in my etsy shop: http://tinyurl.com/7ar5lq
About to go see Frost/Nixon. Hope it's good!
